markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Staff](/Traits.aspx?ID=151)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 637 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This magic item holds spells of a particular theme and allows a spellcaster to cast additional spells by preparing the staff.
name: Staff
